## The Prior's Whisper

In Bayesian lore, we start with a hunch (prior) and let data refine it (posterior). Behold a simple coin-flip oracle using rstanarm.

\`\`\`{r bayes-coin, echo=TRUE, message=FALSE} \# Load the arcane library (install if needed: install.packages("rstanarm")) library(rstanarm)

<!-- # Simulated flips: 7 heads in 10 tosses -->

data \<- list(y = c(rep(1,7), rep(0,3))) \# 1=head

# Divination model

model \<- stan_glm(y \~ 1, family = binomial(link = "logit"), data = data, chains = 4, iter = 1000)

# Posterior summary

print(summary(model)) \`\`\`
